Title: Silverstripe Missing CSRF protection in login form
Description: LoginForm calls disableSecurityToken(), which causes a "shared host domain" vulnerability: http://stackoverflow.com/a/15350123.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.1.18 before 3.1.19, all versions starting from 3.2.3 before 3.2.4, all versions starting from 3.3.1 before 3.3.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.1.18, all versions starting from 3.1.19 before 3.2.3, all versions starting from 3.2.4 before 3.3.1, all versions starting from 3.3.2
